description:
Cute and bright west village apartment. Can host 4 people. Great location, near the 1, A,C, F & M lines. A lot of restaurants, coffee shops, small boutiques. 5 min walk away from the Hudson River with a beautiful view of the One World Trade Center.

We just moved in so we haven't decorated it yet, that is why it looks a little empty on the pictures :)
name: Cute West Village Apartment
review:
Super séjour chez Elodie, l'appartement est très bien situé dans un quartier très vivant.
Elodie nous a conseillé pleins de bonnes adresses.
L'appartement est idéal pour 2-3 personnes.
